functions.tag: {CustomModelData:8,display:{Name:'{"translate":"ニンジャソード","color":"#450B0B","bold":true}',Lore:['[{"text":"❖ ","color":"","italic":false},{"translate":"%1$s%2$s(III)","color":"white","with":[{"translate":"炎の"},{"translate":"刻印"}]}]','{"translate":"インストラクション・ワン！","color":"#DB0000"}','{"translate":"百発のｽﾘｹﾝで倒せぬ","color":"#DB0000"}','{"translate":"相手だからと言って","color":"#DB0000"}','{"translate":"一発の力に頼ってはならぬ","color":"#DB0000"}','{"translate":"一千発のｽﾘｹﾝを投げるのだ！","color":"#DB0000"}','[{"text":"","color":"white","italic":false},{"text":"N","font":"icon","color":"light_purple"},{"text":" 連舞：弐"}]','{"text":"---TUSBMemory---","obfuscated":true,"color":"gray","italic":false}']},Engraving:{EnchantID:"炎",Tier:3},Skill:{Type:"TUSBMemory",Initializing:1b,Job:"忍者",SkillID:226,Name:"連舞",Level:2,Interval:0,Trigger:"近接攻撃する",Count:250},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.knockback_resistance",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.07,Operation:1,UUID:[I;11,0,0,21],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"カスタム",Amount:35,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,0,40],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"カスタム",Amount:6999.3,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,0,50],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"デフォルト",Amount:1.6,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,1,50],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
